SummaryEnglish: Three strangers join a secret corporate “Biz Game” for a massive cash prize—but to survive, they’ll have to trust each other first.

1.SummaryEnglish: Three complete strangers were selected to compete in the Biz Game. The three of them don't get along at all, but have to work together to earn the prize of 1 billion dollars, which all three of them need.

2.SummaryEnglish: Team AAA (No Name) won their first match. In the next match, they're the home team, and they have to plan and learn to co-operate if they have any hope of winning.

3.SummaryEnglish: The final episode starts out with Team AAA (no name), going to the match location. It turns out the match is on a rooftop with a Hawaiian themed party going on. What's gonna be the outcome of the match for Team AAA (no name).
